Name: LOST BETWEEN
About the game: A girl living a nightmare suddenly wakes up and cannot remember a thing! Only that she is obsessed with memories about her father who disappeared , leaving the girl with another memory of having 15 different mothers that accompanied her in life and memories to start the journey of finding her father. After each day she starts to realize she is living an endless nightmare after a nightmare, making her question what is reality and what is a dream! The girl is not giving up and starts to explore the dark world she is lost in! You play as 'The girl' and you will have to explore the dark world of LOST BETWEEN which is twisted and very weird and named MATUSHKAâ€¦ by picking and collecting items you will be able to survive the horrors in your path! by exploring each place in the world of LOST BETWEEN you will have more idea about the story and what is happening to you! Also it will help you to think differently and help you solve puzzles. you will use the environment to your advantage and find dozen of hidden secrets. survive by collecting items that will help you to escape this nightmare and stay alive to find your lost peace!
